content: देव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (वी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [दिव्-अच्] {@--1@} Divine, celestial; <ls>Bg. 11. 11</ls>; <ls>Ms. 12. 117.</ls> {@--2@} Shining; यज्ञस्य देवमृत्विजं <ls>Rv. 1. 1. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Fit to be worshipped or honoured. --वः {@--1@} A god, deity; एको देवः केशवो वा शिवो वा <ls>Bh. 3. 120.</ls> {@--2@} ({%a%}) The god of rain, an epithet of Indra; as in द्वादश वर्षाणि देवो न ववर्ष. ({%b%}) A cloud. {@--3@} A divine man, Brāhmaṇa. {@--4@} A king, ruler, as in मनुष्यदेव. {@--5@} A title affixed to the names of Brāhmaṇas; as in गोविंददेव, पुरुषोत्तमदेव &c. {@--6@} (In dramas) A title of honour used in addressing a king, (‘My lord’, ‘Your majesty’); ततश्च देव <ls>Ve. 4</ls>; यथाज्ञापयति देवः &c. {@--7@} Quicksilver. {@--8@} The Supreme Spirit. {@--9@} A fool. {@--10@} A child. {@--11@} A man following any particular business. {@--12@} A lover. {@--13@} Emulation. {@--14@} Sport, play. --वं An organ of sense. [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>L.</ab> {%deus%}; <ab>Gr.</ab> {%deos%}].
